summary:
Saudi Arabia is a large country in Western Asia, covering most of the Arabian Peninsula. It is bordered by the Red Sea and the Persian Gulf, and has a desert landscape. The capital is Riyadh, and other important cities include Jeddah, Mecca, and Medina. With over 32 million people, it is one of the most populous Arab countries.

The area has a rich history, with ancient civilizations and the emergence of Islam in the 7th century. The modern kingdom was founded in 1932 by King Abdulaziz. It is an absolute monarchy with Islam as the official religion. Saudi Arabia is a major oil producer and has a strong economy.
title: Saudi Arabia
